Description: Featuring city views and free WiFi, Les Lofts de Morny features accommodation ideally situated in the Deauville City Centre of Deauville, within a short distance of Port of Deauville, Promenade des Planches and Deauville-La Touques Racecourse.
Set just a 10-miute walk from the Two Towers of Bologna, B&B Chez Moi offers free Wi-Fi throughout. It features elegant rooms with a modern en suite bathroom, and an Italian-style breakfast.
